title: Grocery List Generator
description: You are helping a friend who is starting a new healthy eating plan. They have asked you to create a Python program that will generate a grocery list based on their meal plan for the week. Your task is to create a program that will take in their meal plan and generate a grocery list of all the ingredients needed for the week.
